Package emissary.command

Class ServiceCommand

java.lang.Object
emissary.command.BaseCommand
emissary.command.HttpCommand
emissary.command.ServiceCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
EmissaryCommand, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FeedCommand, ServerCommand
public abstract class ServiceCommand extends HttpCommand
Abstract command to control service components (stop/pause/unpause)
